column5: Headed up to my grandparents place in Hanover today after work and decided to walk some creeks in the area.  Found an open field with long grass, and a DEEP hole, started drifting and started catching.  My guess is that this is part of the Saugeen Watershed, but I'm not 100% sure.  Caught 13 in all, all released, here's a few pics from today ...
Nice job out there!  I gotta get my float rod out and do some trib fishing again soon.
NICE TROUT !!!!!!!!!     well done bud    cheers
A couple more like the one in the last picture and you have yourself a nice snack... Nice Fish... Specks are my favourite fish to catch and eat..
A lot of small fish, but the one around 12 inches was a good one.
Awesome man... Those brookies are soo much fun, especially on Ultra Light gear, Thanks for the report
